text: Part of the wall, ruined house at Ardagh Ardagh () is a townland in the fertile district known as the Laggan in East Donegal, part of County Donegal in Ulster, Ireland. It is very near St. Johnston. It became part of the large Abercorn Estate and was settled by mainly Lowland Scots settlers during the Plantation of Ulster. ==See also== * List of towns and villages in Ireland Category:Towns and villages in County Donegal
title: Ardagh, County Donegal
